name: Supply the Front
description:
i challenged myself to make a game in 1 month and this is the result.

You are a member on an army with the goal of keeping your side stocked up with supplies, you will get orders from different areas of the trench and it is up to you to get those supplies and deliver them to where theyre needed. when you deliver enough supplies your forces will grow stronger and you will receive reinforcements however the enemies have these same rules.

i did run out of time while making this game however i think in future i will return to it and expand on it more but at this point it is more of a proof of concept.
